alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Marshall; Story; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:19AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Poweshiek, northeastern Polk, eastern Story, Marshall, southwestern Tama, south central Grundy and northern Jasper Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1219 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Nevada to 11 miles northwest of Baxter to 8 miles northeast of Bondurant. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... State Center and Baxter around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Marshalltown, Conrad, Rock Creek Lake and Meskwaki Casino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Iowa.
